subject: Freestyle Skiing
Sports Injuries
Olympic Games
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The 2014 Olympic favorite from Canada died from injuries sustained last week in a fall during a training run in a 22-foot halfpipe at Park City Mountain Resort in Utah.
snippet: The 2014 Olympic favorite from Canada died from injuries sustained last week in a fall during a training run in a 22-foot halfpipe at Park City Mountain Resort in Utah.
